Replace the header logo text 'Dondon's Core' with 'Dondon's little luxuries' and wire in the generated logo image frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-dondon-luxuries.dim_400x120.png as a static asset in the header branding section. Update the footer branding text from 'Dondon's Core' to 'Dondon's little luxuries'. Preserve all existing className attributes, Tailwind utility classes, layout structure, colors, font families, font sizes, spacing, and styling exactly as they are
Update any text references to 'Dondon's Core' in the hero banner or page content to 'Dondon's little luxuries' without changing any styling, layout, or other UI elements
